sentences.english: Ouch, I am still young, but I have to go to Heaven now.
sentences.chinese: 哎吆，我還年輕，但現在要上天堂了。

sentences.english: Gee, if I'm right, a billion Chinese must be wrong.
sentences.chinese: 唉吆，要是我說對了，那麼十億中國人一定是錯了。
